EN

MARA Holdings has moved $86.9 million in Bitcoin in 10 hours to wallets tied to Two Prime BitGo, and a fresh address. The post Bitcoin Miner MARA Moves 1,318 BTC in 10 Hours, Traders Wary of Forced Miner Selling appeared first on Cryptonews.
